emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Hello, During our research on user account enumeration flaws on Estonian online services, we found that your website is vulnerable to the exposure of registered user email addresses. The vulnerability report is attached. We would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this email to prevent us from reaching out to you through other channels. Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Hello, During our research on user account enumeration flaws on Estonian online services, we found that your website is vulnerable to the exposure of registered user email addresses. The vulnerability report is attached. We would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this email to prevent us from reaching out to you through other channels. Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: Re: User email address enumeration vulnerability on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml:
Hello,

We have conducted a follow-up reassessment of the service, and we appreciate your commitment to 
improving the security of your service. However, we also found that the account enumeration 
vulnerability is still not fully mitigated.

The attached updated report provides an overview of the remaining concerns and is intended to guide 
further corrective actions.

Best regards,
Gregor Eesmaa
Computer Science MSc student
University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: Re: User email address enumeration vulnerability on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml:
Thank you for the feedback.. We use captcha as the last straw to prevent bots, because it also scares away some real users. So our business side prefers to use firewalls and third party service providers to filter our traffic and block suspicious attempts which seem to be automated attacks.. But yes, this different approach on registering form was not intentional- we will refactor this logic again, thanks for bringing it up in the post-test.

Regards
Rainer Nagel
AllePal OÜ
+3725146540

emails.subject: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses kv.ee / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml: Lugupeetud kv.ee vastutav andmetöötleja Pöördun, et edastada ametlikult mure isikuandmete kaitse üldmääruse (IKÜM) alusel seoses minu isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses kv.ee, mida pean ebaseaduslikuks ning mis võib viia nende avaldamiseni selleks volitamata isikutele ilma selge õigusliku aluseta. Manuses on ametlik taotlus (samuti digiallkirjastatud kujul), milles teostan oma õigusi IKÜM artiklite 15, 18 ja 21 alusel. Palun selle läbivaatust ja vastavate meetmete võtmist ajaraamis, mis on sätestatud IKÜM artiklis 12(3) (üks kuu taotluse saamisest). Palun teavitage taotluse kättesaamisest. Lugupidamisega Gregor Eesmaa -- Dear Data Controller of kv.ee, I am contacting you to formally raise concerns under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regarding what I believe to be the unlawful processing of my personal data by kv.ee, potentially leading to its disclosure to unauthorised parties without a clear legal basis. Please find attached a formal application (also in digitally signed form) exercising my rights under Articles 15, 18, and 21 of the GDPR. I request that you review and act upon it accordingly, within the timeframe established by Article 12(3) of the GDPR (one month from receipt). Please confirm receipt of this request. Kind regards, Gregor Eesmaa

emails.subject: Re: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega teenuses kv.ee / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on kv.ee
emails.bodyHtml:
Tere Gregor

Tänan Teid pöördumise eest.
Olen seisukohal, et kv.ee hetke süsteemi toimimine ei ole turvarisk ja ei riku isikuandmete töötlemise põhimõteid. Hetkeseisuga ei ole plaanis täiendavaid muudatusi süsteemis teha kui Andmekaitseinspektsioon just ei teata, et see on hädavajalik. Kui tunnete, et Teie kui andmesubjekti õigusi on rikutud saate pöörduda AKI poole vastava avaldusega.
Isikuandmete töötlemise korraga saate tutvuda siin https://www.kv.ee/andmekaitsetingimused

Lugupidamisega

Tatjana Sõtšev
Menetlusspetsialist/Andmekaitsespetsialist
AllePal OÜ
